<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1232</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Chanukah Mystery Webquest</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chanukah Geheimnis Webquest</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mystère Webquest de Chanukah</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mistério Webquest De Chanukah</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mistero Webquest Di Chanukah</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μυστήριο Webquest Chanukah</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Misterio Webquest De Chanukah</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">learners in grades 3 through 5 learn what makes a kosher chanukiah (menorah) and then apply their knowledge by classifiying a collection of chanukiot and creating their own chanukiah.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">jewish holidays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">online activity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chanukah</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">webquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anfänger in Graden 3 bis 5 erlernen was ein 
reines chanukiah (menorah) bildet und dann ihr Wissen anwendet, indem 
sie eine Ansammlung chanukiot classifiying und ihr eigenes chanukiah 
erstellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les étudiants dans les catégories 3 à 5 
apprennent ce qui fait un chanukiah cacher (menorah) et puis applique 
leur connaissance classifiying une collection de chanukiot et en 
créant leur propre chanukiah.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os learners nas classes 3 a 5 aprendem o que faz 
um chanukiah kosher (menorah) e aplica então seu conhecimento 
classifiying uma coleção do chanukiot e criando seu próprio 
chanukiah.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">i principianti nei gradi da 3 a 5 imparano che 
cosa fa un chanukiah cascer (menorah) ed allora applicano la loro 
conoscenza classifiying una collezione di chanukiot e creando il loro 
proprio chanukiah.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οι αρχάριοι στους βαθμούς 3 μέχρι 5 μαθαίνουν τι 
κάνει ένα kosher chanukiah (menorah) και εφαρμόζουν 
έπειτα τη γνώση τους με μια συλλογή του chanukiot και τη 
δημιουργία του chanukiah τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">los principiantes en los grados 3 a 5 aprenden 
qué hace un chanukiah kosher (menorah) y después aplica su 
conocimiento classifiying una colección de chanukiot y creando su 
propio chanukiah.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">jüdische Feiertage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Online-Dienst</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">chanukah</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">webquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vacances juives</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">activité en ligne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">chanukah</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">webquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">chanukah</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">chanukah</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εβραϊκές διακοπές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σε απευθείας σύνδεση δραστηριότητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">chanukah</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
